socket

Class Dispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • socket.Dispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Dispatcher
extends java.lang.Thread
    Dispatcher Dispatcher is the that manage the socket communications. This class will be the one who tries to reconnect when the conection is lost.
    Author:
    Skynet Team
